## GlobalStat interface


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface GlobalStat 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [downloadSpeed](./aria2.globalstat.downloadspeed.md) | string | Overall download speed (byte/sec). |
|  [numActive](./aria2.globalstat.numactive.md) | string | The number of active downloads. |
|  [numStopped](./aria2.globalstat.numstopped.md) | string | The number of stopped downloads in the current session. This value is capped by the --max-download-result option. |
|  [numStoppedTotal](./aria2.globalstat.numstoppedtotal.md) | string | The number of stopped downloads in the current session and not capped by the --max-download-result option. |
|  [numWaiting](./aria2.globalstat.numwaiting.md) | string | The number of waiting downloads. |
|  [uploadSpeed](./aria2.globalstat.uploadspeed.md) | string | Overall upload speed(byte/sec). |
